thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Of India Posts Dec-Qtr Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank Of India Posts Dec-Qtr Loss
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Bank Of India Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 23.41 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.02 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER LOSS WAS 693.9 MILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 93.35 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 98.25 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 49 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 23.03 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 43.73 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 25.46 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 16.93 PERCENT VERSUS 12.62 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 10.29 PERCENT VERSUS 6.47 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text: bit.ly/2ElMV1b Further company coverage:
